item.title: BLWL[24] Linux命令行快捷键
item.description: Keystrokes for Navigating Command Lines Keystroke Full Name Meaning Ctrl + F Character forward Go forward one character. Ctrl + B Character backward Go backward one character. Alt + F Word forward Go forward one word. Alt + B Word backward Go backward one word. Ctrl + A Beginning of line Go to the beginning of the current line. Ctrl + E End of line Go to the end of
